replaceregexp.replace: declare @entity_id numeric(18)${line.separator}UPDATE SEQ_TABLE_HILO SET @entity_id = ID_SEQUENCE_NEXT_HI_VALUE, ID_SEQUENCE_NEXT_HI_VALUE = ID_SEQUENCE_NEXT_HI_VALUE + 1 WHERE STR_SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_ID_ENTITY'${line.separator}\1@entity_id\2${line.separator}
